text:
Software Engineer | Menlo Park, CA | ONSITE | $100 - 180k | seed stage equity

Ladder Life (ladderlife.com). Life Insurance is huge market that is totally non-digital and focused on the sales agent channel. We are building a company that is built from the ground up around the end user and all digital.

tech: Clojure, ClojureScript, Om.next, Datomic, Docker, AWS ECS
